@@ -58,0 +58,3 @@ + private static final String NEW_LINE_SEPARATOR = "\n"; + private static final String BULLET_CHARACTER = "\\u2022 "; + @@ -102,1 +105,1 @@ - report.append(StringToolkit.join(reports, " =>
